abstract: Joe Drape and Zach Hillesland will be live-blogging all day on Saturday, with on-site feeds from Pete Thamel at Oklahoma State-Texas and Pete Bigelow at Michigan-Michigan State.
snippet: Joe Drape and Zach Hillesland will be live-blogging all day on Saturday, with on-site feeds from Pete Thamel at Oklahoma State-Texas and Pete Bigelow at Michigan-Michigan State.
lead_paragraph: Joe Drape and Zach Hillesland will be live-blogging all day on Saturday, with on-site feeds from Pete Thamel at Oklahoma State-Texas and Pete Bigelow at Michigan-Michigan State. Check back throughout the day for updates and analysis, to ask questions or to give us your observations, whether from your couch or from the bleachers.

headline.main: Live Analysis: College Football Week Seven
